From: "Trans formers" <logomorph@...>

::DarkMouse::

*With little energy left, she slowly climbs up to her knees.  She looks at 
Manterror.  For some strange reason, she felt sorry for him.  She knew he 
was trying to kill her, but she still felt some pity for him.  It took most 
of her strength, but she finally stood up.  She aimed her gun at Manterror.  
She looked at him.  She stared into his optics.*

"I'm sorry.  I don't want to kill you.  Please don't make me kill you.  Just 
go and fly away from here and leave us in peace."

*A tear fell down her cheek.  It was partially from the pain from her 
injuries, partially because she knew that he would still attack her and try 
to kill her.  She knew she had to kill him or be killed.  Somehow, 
somewhere, she hated killing.  It hurt her to her core that she would have 
to take a life in order to save others. She raised her gun and took aim on 
Manterror.*

"Please leave.  Go, fly away.  GO! NOW! PLEASE!"

*Tears started to stream down her face.  This was the part in war that she 
hated most of all.  But honor somtimes demands the most disagreable of 
tasks*
----------Original Message-------------
>From: KSLawdogg@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

>Subject: Re: NeO bEaSt WaRs RpG

>Injector/Manterror/Double Punch/Counter Punch:
>
>
>
>Injector fell back from Triceradon's shots, falling to his back.
>
>---
>
>Manterror fell back a foot as Dark Mouse shot him, raising his arms though,
>he took precise aim at the middle of the traitor's face.  Getting ready to
>fire and hopefully finish her off, several blasts sent him slamming into a
>tree.  Quickly assessing the situation, he fired an ion disk at Triceradon,
>though a few of the Maximal's shots sent him to the ground.
>
>---
>
>Counter Punch got behind a boulder, Triceradon's shots chipping at it.
>Getting up, he had his missile launcher in one arm, a photon rifle in the
>other.  Firing two shots off at Triceradon from the rifle, and a rocket at
>Stegotron, he let out an almost silent cry as the combined kick backs 
>hurdled
>him to the ground backwards.
>
>---
>
>Double Punch leapt over a log, slamming to the ground feet first.  Raising 
>a
>pincher, he launched Beeline, his cyber-bee to take up the fight as he 
>slowly
>advanced.  Taking flight, the cyber-bee scanned the area of Manterror's
>coordinates.  Activating its laser weapons in its optic sensors, it 
>acquired
>a target.  It dived, firing a single optic blast at Striker.
